Text: This is like the other 2 versions, there is a decompression issue.
Directx file in the game is not good. (error message)

Ok, all I did was update my Directx and the game started fine.
I went from here: http://pcsupport.about.com/od/fixtheproblem/ht/directx9xp.htm
I had the decompression issue too. What seems to be the problem? My DirectX seems fine. It's up to date also.
